name: PCB Motor Calculator & 3D Visualizer
description: Flask-based web app for PCB motor parameter calculations with interactive 3D visualization using Three.js. Includes real-time torque, speed, and efficiency analysis.

name: SysControl - Remote Admin Bot
description: Telegram bot for remote system administration. Control PC operations, monitor resources, execute commands, and manage files from anywhere securely.

name: Smart Calculator - AI Handwriting Recognition
description: AI-powered calculator recognizing handwritten mathematical expressions. Uses CNN for digit recognition and expression parsing for computation.

name: Gmail-to-Telegram Notifier
description: Multi-account Gmail monitoring system with instant Telegram notifications. Supports custom filters, attachment previews, and priority flagging.

name: PDF Eye-Saver & Background Changer
description: Utility to convert bright PDF backgrounds to eye-friendly dark mode. Batch processing support with customizable color schemes.

name: Machine Learning Algorithm Suite
description: Comprehensive collection of ML algorithms implemented from scratch including regression, classification, clustering, and neural networks with visualizations.

name: Flask Multi-App Collection
description: Portfolio of Flask web applications including authentication systems, REST APIs, real-time dashboards, and database-driven apps.

name: Deep Learning MNIST Classifier
description: CNN-based handwritten digit classifier achieving 99%+ accuracy on MNIST dataset. Includes model visualization and deployment ready API.
